backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two UI features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layers defining light/dark theme OKLCH color tokens and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags and root element loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component assembling the site layout with header, sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LogoMark.tsx: Logo component rendering the PATIL Construction logo with styled container for contrast.
frontend/src/components/Sections/AboutSe: About section showing company description, highlights list, and a stats card.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Contact: Contact section with form validation, contact info cards, and business hours set to Always Open.
frontend/src/components/Sections/HeroSec: Hero section with banner image, headline content, and buttons that scroll to services or contact.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Service: Services section rendering service cards with mapped icons and descriptions from siteCopy.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer containing logo, quick links, services list, and attribution with dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive site header with logo and navigation, including mobile sheet menu and smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Contains site marketing copy for hero, about, and services sections as structured text content.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, updating when Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing for future React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining light and dark construction-themed color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, features, requests, and internal versioning.
